column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is a great place to come with a big group of people
column2: or come on a romantical date and sit at the bar. I love sitting outside on the patio and last time I was there I glanced over at the table next to us and Jenna Fischer (Pam from The Office) was sitting right there! That made this place just a lil bit cooler!
